Package com.github.alexisc183.jforconsol

package com.github.alexisc183.jforconsol

Provides classes and interfaces mainly for CLI app development.

The classes and interfaces of this package can be classified as follows:
  • Aid over 'missing' features of the language
  • Aid over 'missing' built-ins of the Java(TM) SE platform
  • Safety on input requests
  • Friendly output visualization on CLI environments
  • Other
The purpose of this package is to speed up the coding process of programs that may be run solely for debugging purposes or applications that make use of a command-line interface (CLI).

@since JForconsol 1.0.0

    Thrown to indicate that the program has attempted to convert a string to another type, but the string does not have the appropriate format.
    InputRequest
    Requests of an input value to the user with the certainty of said value always being correct.

    Request of an input value to the user with the certainty of said value always being correct.

    An animated loading message thought to be used for operations that take time to be completed.

    PrintableTable
    Prints of a 2D array in a tabular fashion on the "standard" output stream.

    Constants for aligning elements of arrays printed with a PrintableTable instance.
